column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Captain says : " Varrick is not gon na be happy about this . "
#Text=Eska says : " Where is he ? "
#Text=Desna says : " Father said he would meet us at this location .
#Text=Where is the Avatar ?
#Text=" Eska says : " She was within our grasp until a dark spirit attacked her .
#Text=" Desna says : " They 're out of control .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " You did n't get her ?
#Text=" Eska says : " The Avatar is dead .
#Text=" Nuktuk says : " We finally made it .
#Text=Now , we must stop the evil Unalaq !
#Text=" Evil Unalaq says : " The Southern Water Tribe is mine .
#Text=Next , I will conquer the world with my waterbending doomsday device !
#Text=" Nuktuk says : " Do n't worry , Juji and Roh - Tan , I will end the evil Unalaq 's reign of terror .
#Text=For I am Nuktuk , hero of the South !
#Text=" Juji says : " Nuktuk , you 're not just the hero of the South , you 're our best friend .
#Text=" Roh - Tan says : " Nuktuk - ity !
#Text=" Nuktuk says : " You two are the best snow raccoon and arctic panda a guy could ask for .
#Text=" Crowd says : " Aww !
#Text=" Voice narrator says : " Who 's gon na fight for friends and freedom ?
#Text=Nuktuk .
#Text=He 's the biggest , baddest , bendingest man I know .
#Text=Who protects the icy tundra ?
#Text=Nuktuk .
#Text=Battling Northies out there in the snow .
#Text=When Unalaq starts trouble , he 'll punch him in the mouth .
#Text=He 's Nuktuk , the hero of the South .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Bolin , look up there .
#Text=What do you see ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " I - is this a trick question ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " I 'll tell you what I see : a star being born .
#Text=You 're a star .
#Text=People love stars .
#Text=Stars tell them what to think and how to act .
#Text=Bolin , have you ever tried to force a monkey marmot to ride a bicycle ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Uh ... not that I can recall .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Of course you have n't .
#Text=You ca n't force monkey marmots to do anything .
#Text=They 've got to want to do it themselves !

#Text=" Bolin says : " Right ... " Varrick says : " With these movers , we 'll have the support of the people , and before long , they 'll persuade the President to lend his troops to the war effort .
#Text=" Evil Unalaq says : " My evil plan is working .
#Text=I 've captured Nuktuk 's beautiful girlfriend .
#Text=" Nuktuk says : " Not so fast , Evil Unalaq !
#Text=Oh , I will save my true love and the South !
#Text=And now , your time is up .
#Text=" Evil Unalaq says : " It 's no use fighting , Nuktuk .
#Text=My anti-energy net makes bending impossible .
#Text=" Nuktuk says : " No !
#Text=Please .
#Text=Power ... weakening .
#Text=" Ron - Tah says : " Nuk - terrible .
#Text=" Voice narrator says : " Will this be the end of Nuktuk ?
#Text=Can he escape from Unalaq 's trap and save the beautiful Ginger ?
#Text=Find out next week on The Adventures of Nuktuk : Hero of the South .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Wow .
#Text=We got some major chemistry on - screen .
#Text=Am I right ?
#Text=" Ginger says : " Yeah .
#Text=On - screen .
#Text=" Bolin says : " What 's wrong ?
#Text=Are you mad because I left you in the clutches of the evil Unalaq ?
#Text=I 'm gon na save you in the next episode .
#Text=Ginger , let 's work through this .
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " Varrick , another one of your ships has been captured .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Darn it , Zhu Li , have n't I told you I hate getting bad news without first getting good news ?
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " Oh , well , the good news is it looks like your first mover has gotten a great reception .
#Text=" Varrick says : " That 's old news !
#Text=Let 's go .
#Text="
